languages.text: Возглавляемые миссией Экклезиархии, пустотники устроили массовые моления, пока жрецы совершали священные ритуалы по изгнанию скверны. Некоторые из наиболее глубоко зараженных не выдержали прославления Бога-Императора и отдали концы прежде, чем корабль покинул Имматериум.

traits.locale_text: Возглавляемые миссией Экклезиархии, пустотники устроили массовые моления, пока жрецы совершали священные ритуалы по изгнанию скверны. Некоторые из наиболее глубоко зараженных не выдержали прославления Бога-Императора и отдали концы прежде, чем корабль покинул Имматериум.

languages.text: Led by the preachers of the Ecclesiarchy, the voidsmen gathered for a mass prayer as the priests chanted holy verses to banish the corruption. Some of the more severely infested crew members failed to endure the celebration of the God-Emperor's glory and perished before the vessel could leave the Immaterium.
languages.original_text: Возглавляемые миссией Экклезиархии, пустотники устроили массовые моления, пока жрецы совершали священные ритуалы по изгнанию скверны. Некоторые из наиболее глубоко зараженных не выдержали прославления Бога-Императора и отдали концы прежде, чем корабль покинул Имматериум.

traits.locale_text: Led by the preachers of the Ecclesiarchy, the voidsmen gathered for a mass prayer as the priests chanted holy verses to banish the corruption. Some of the badly infested crew members failed to endure the celebration of the God-Emperor's glory and perished before the vessel could leave the Immaterium.

Led by the preachers of the Ecclesiarchy, the voidsmen gathered for a mass prayer as the priests chanted holy verses to banish the corruption. Some of the badly infested crew members failed to endure the celebration of the God-Emperor's glory and perished before the vessel could leave the Immaterium.

Led by the preachers of the Ecclesiarchy, the voidsmen gathered for a mass prayer as the priests chanted holy verses to banish the corruption. Some of the more severely infested crew members failed to endure the celebration of the God-Emperor's glory and perished before the vessel could leave the Immaterium.

Led by the preachers of the Ecclesiarchy, the voidsmen gathered for a mass prayer as the priests chanted holy verses to banish the corruption. Some of the more severely infested crew members failed to endure the celebration of the God-Emperor's glory and perished before the vessel could leave the Immaterium.

Led by the preachers of the Ecclesiarchy, the voidsmen gathered for a mass prayer as the priests chanted holy verses to banish the corruption. Some of the more severely infested crew members failed to endure the celebration of the God-Emperor's glory and perished before the vessel could leave the Immaterium.

languages.text: 在国教布道士的带领下，船员聚集在一起进行集体祈祷。牧师们吟诵圣歌，消除腐化。一部分感染较为严重的船员没能撑过神皇的荣耀圣典，在舰船离开亚空间之前就一命呜呼。
languages.original_text: Led by the preachers of the Ecclesiarchy, the voidsmen gathered for a mass prayer as the priests chanted holy verses to banish the corruption. Some of the more severely infested crew members failed to endure the celebration of the God-Emperor's glory and perished before the vessel could leave the Immaterium.

traits.locale_text: 在国教布道士的带领下，船员聚集在一起进行集体祈祷。牧师们吟诵圣歌，消除腐化。一部分感染较为严重的船员没能撑过神皇的荣耀圣典，在舰船离开亚空间之前就一命呜呼。

languages.text: Dirigidos por los predicadores de la Eclesiarquía, los soldados del vacío se reunieron para rezar mientras los sacerdotes entonaban versos sagrados para desterrar la corrupción. Algunos de los tripulantes más gravemente infestados no soportaron la celebración de la gloria del Dios Emperador y perecieron antes de que la nave pudiera abandonar el Inmaterio.
languages.original_text: Led by the preachers of the Ecclesiarchy, the voidsmen gathered for a mass prayer as the priests chanted holy verses to banish the corruption. Some of the more severely infested crew members failed to endure the celebration of the God-Emperor's glory and perished before the vessel could leave the Immaterium.

traits.locale_text: Dirigidos por los predicadores de la Eclesiarquía, los soldados del vacío se reunieron para rezar mientras los sacerdotes entonaban versos sagrados para desterrar la corrupción. Algunos de los tripulantes más gravemente infestados no soportaron la celebración de la gloria del Dios Emperador y perecieron antes de que la nave pudiera abandonar el Inmaterio.

languages.text: 帝国聖教会のプリーチャーに導かれて、ヴォイズマンは大勢で祈るために集まり、司祭は聖なる詩を唱え、腐敗を追放しようとする。感染が深刻な一部のクルーは、神帝陛下の栄光の祝詞に耐えることができず、船が非物質世界を抜け出す前に命を落とした。
languages.original_text: Led by the preachers of the Ecclesiarchy, the voidsmen gathered for a mass prayer as the priests chanted holy verses to banish the corruption. Some of the more severely infested crew members failed to endure the celebration of the God-Emperor's glory and perished before the vessel could leave the Immaterium.

traits.locale_text: 帝国聖教会のプリーチャーに導かれて、ヴォイズマンは大勢で祈るために集まり、司祭は聖なる詩を唱え、腐敗を追放しようとする。感染が深刻な一部のクルーは、神帝陛下の栄光の祝詞に耐えることができず、船が非物質世界を抜け出す前に命を落とした。

languages.text: Menés par les prêcheurs de l'Ecclésiarchie, les cosmomarins se rassemblent pour une prière collective tandis que les prêtres entonnent des versets sacrés censés dissiper la corruption. Certains des membres de l'équipage parmi les plus touchés ne supportent pas ce rassemblement à la gloire de l'Empereur-Dieu et périssent avant même que le vaisseau ait pu quitter l'Immaterium.
languages.original_text: Led by the preachers of the Ecclesiarchy, the voidsmen gathered for a mass prayer as the priests chanted holy verses to banish the corruption. Some of the more severely infested crew members failed to endure the celebration of the God-Emperor's glory and perished before the vessel could leave the Immaterium.

traits.locale_text: Menés par les prêcheurs de l'Ecclésiarchie, les cosmomarins se rassemblent pour une prière collective tandis que les prêtres entonnent des versets sacrés censés dissiper la corruption. Certains des membres de l'équipage parmi les plus touchés ne supportent pas ce rassemblement à la gloire de l'Empereur-Dieu et périssent avant même que le vaisseau ait pu quitter l'Immaterium.

languages.text: Angeführt von den Predigern der Ekklesiarchie haben sich die Raumfahrer zu einem Massengebet versammelt, bei dem die Priester die Verderbnis durch heilige Verse zu verbannen versuchten. Einige der schwer betroffenen Crewmitglieder konnten die Lobpreisung des Gottimperators nicht ertragen und starben, bevor das Schiff das Immaterium verlassen konnte.
languages.original_text: Led by the preachers of the Ecclesiarchy, the voidsmen gathered for a mass prayer as the priests chanted holy verses to banish the corruption. Some of the more severely infested crew members failed to endure the celebration of the God-Emperor's glory and perished before the vessel could leave the Immaterium.

traits.locale_text: Angeführt von den Predigern der Ekklesiarchie haben sich die Raumfahrer zu einem Massengebet versammelt, bei dem die Priester die Verderbnis durch heilige Verse zu verbannen versuchten. Einige der schwer betroffenen Crewmitglieder konnten die Lobpreisung des Gottimperators nicht ertragen und starben, bevor das Schiff das Immaterium verlassen konnte.

languages.text: Ekleşiarşi'nin vaizlerinin önderliğindeki uçsuz erleri, toplu bir dua için bir araya geldi. Rahipler, yozlaşmayı kovmak için kutsal ayetler okudu. Durumdan daha ağır etkilenen kimi tayfalar ise Tanrı İmparator'un görkemine başvuran törenlere dayanamadı ve gemi Tindiyar'dan çıkamadan hayatını kaybetti.
languages.original_text: Led by the preachers of the Ecclesiarchy, the voidsmen gathered for a mass prayer as the priests chanted holy verses to banish the corruption. Some of the more severely infested crew members failed to endure the celebration of the God-Emperor's glory and perished before the vessel could leave the Immaterium.
